title: Silique RNA Extraction
original description: This protocol was based on a 2010 paper by Meng and Feldman for extraction of RNA from arabidopsis siliques. While the protocol remains unchanged, I have made some slight edits to streamline it in the lab and also added some notes regarding my results applying this protocol to tobacoo fruit tissue.
steps:
Lysis
1. Add three stainless steel BBs to each 2-mL tube with tissue in liquid nitrogen and homogenize the samples in a Retsch mixer mill for 60 seconds at 25 Hz.
2. Add 1.2mL of Extraction Buffer (with βME or DTT added) to the frozen tissue and mix.
1.2amount
3. After brief mixing, vortex vigorously for 5 min, and spin for 5 min at 11 000×g.
300s 
300s

RNA Partitioning 1
4. Transfer the supernatant to a new 2-mL Eppendorf tube, add 0.5 volume of chloroform (~500μL) and vortex for 2 min.
500amount 
120s
5. Add 0.5 volume of acid phenol (water-saturated; ~500μL) and vortex for another 2 min.
500amount 
120s
6. Centrifuge at 11,000g for 15 min.
900s

Nucleic Acid Precipitation 1
7. Carefully remove the upper aqueous phase (avoiding the interface) to a new RNase-free 2-mL Eppendorf tube, and add 90μL 3 M sodium acetate (pH 5.2) and 600μL isopropanol. Mix briefly.
90amount 
600amount
8. Incubate at room temp for 10 min then spin at 11,000g for 10 min.
600s 
600s
9. Discard the upper aqueous phase and wash the pellet with 1 mL 75% ethanol (RNase-free).
1amount
10. Spin at 11,000g for 10 min, and discard the supernatant. Air dry the pellet briefly (<5 min).
600s 
300s

RNA Partitioning 2
11. Resuspend the pellet in1 mL TRIzol reagent and vortex until dissolved.
1amount
12. Add 200µL chloroform and mix by shaking vigorously for 15s.
200amount 
15s
13. Incubate for 2–3 min, then  centrifuge at 11,000g at 4°C for 15 min.
120s 
900s

Nucleic Acid Precipitation 2
14. Transfer the upper aqueous phase to a new well-labeled RNase-free 1.5-mL Eppendorf tube containing 500μL isopropanol. Mix, then incubate for 10 min. This is the tube that will be used for final storage. A white mat may form in the aqueous phase, and should also be transferred.
500amount 
600s
15. Spin at 11 000×g at 4°C for 15 min
900s
16. Wash the pellet with 1.2 mL 75% ethanol RNase-free), and spin at 11 000×g at 4°C for 10 min.
1.2amount 
600s
17. Discard the supernatant and dry the pellet.
18. Dissolve the RNA pellet in 100μL DEPC-treated, sterilized ddH2O.
100amount

Nucleic Acid Precipitation 3
19. Add 10μL DEPC-treated 3 M sodium acetate (pH 5.2) and 250μL RNase-free 100% ethanol and mix.
10amount 
250amount
20. Incubate for 20 min, then spin at 11,000g at 4°C for 15 min.
1200s 
900s
21. Wash the pellet with 1.2 mL 75% ethanol, then spin at 11,000g at 4°C for 10 min.
1.2amount 
600s
22. Discard the supernatant and dry the RNA pellet.

Resuspension and Storage
23. Dissolve the pellet in 50μL DEPC-treated, sterilized ddH2O, and store at – 80°C.
50amount
ai_generated_description: The objective of this protocol is to extract RNA from arabidopsis siliques using a modified version of Meng and Feldman's 2010 method, while also providing notes on the application of this protocol to tobacoo fruit tissue. The protocol involves a series of lysis, RNA partitioning, nucleic acid precipitation, and resuspension steps to efficiently isolate RNA from these plant tissues.

# Protocol steps
homogenize_samples(sample="tissue", homogenization_params="60 sec, 25 Hz, with 3 stainless steel BBs")
mix_extraction_buffer(sample="tissue", buffer_vol="1.2 mL")

transfer_supernatant(transfer_params="avoid interface", tube_type="new RNase-free 2-mL", reagent_vol="1.2 mL")

vortex(vortex_params="gentle", time="2 min")
add_reagent(reagent_type="acid phenol", reagent_vol="~500μL")
vortex(vortex_params="gentle", time="2 min")
centrifuge(centrifugation_params="11,000g", tube_type="2-mL", time="15 min")
transfer_supernatant(transfer_params="upper phase, avoiding interface", tube_type="new RNase-free 2-mL", reagent_vol="as much as possible")
add_reagent(reagent_type="3 M sodium acetate", reagent_vol="90μL")
add_reagent(reagent_type="isopropanol", reagent_vol="600μL")
incubate(incubation_params="room temp", time="10 min")
centrifuge(centrifugation_params="11,000g", tube_type="2-mL", time="10 min")
discard_supernatant_and_add_new_reagent(reagent_type="75% ethanol", reagent_vol="1 mL")
centrifuge(centrifugation_params="11,000g", tube_type="2-mL", time="10 min")
air_dry(time="<5 min")
add_reagent(reagent_type="TRIzol reagent", reagent_vol="1 mL")
vortex(vortex_params="until dissolved", time="variable")
add_reagent(reagent_type="chloroform", reagent_vol="200µL")
shake_vigorously(time="15 sec")
incubate(incubation_params="room temp", time="2-3 min")
centrifuge(centrifugation_params="11,000g, 4°C", tube_type="1.5-mL", time="15 min")
transfer_supernatant(transfer_params="upper phase, avoiding interface", tube_type="new well-labeled RNase-free 1.5-mL", reagent_vol="as much as possible")
add_reagent(reagent_type="isopropanol", reagent_vol="500μL")
incubate(incubation_params="room temp", time="10 min")
centrifuge(centrifugation_params="11,000g, 4°C", tube_type="1.5-mL", time="15 min")
discard_supernatant_and_add_new_reagent(reagent_type="75% ethanol", reagent_vol="1.2 mL")
centrifuge(centrifugation_params="11,000g, 4°C", tube_type="1.5-mL", time="10 min")

add_reagent(reagent_type="DEPC-treated, sterilized ddH2O", reagent_vol="100μL")
add_reagent(reagent_type="DEPC-treated 3 M sodium acetate", reagent_vol="10μL")
add_reagent(reagent_type="RNase-free 100% ethanol", reagent_vol="250μL")
incubate(incubation_params="room temp", time="20 min")
centrifuge(centrifugation_params="11,000g, 4°C", tube_type="1.5-mL", time="15 min")
discard_supernatant_and_add_new_reagent(reagent_type="75% ethanol", reagent_vol="1.2 mL")
centrifuge(centrifugation_params="11,000g, 4°C", tube_type="1.5-mL", time="10 min")
air_dry(time="variable")
add_reagent(reagent_type="DEPC-treated, sterilized ddH2O", reagent_vol="50μL")
store_sample(storage_temperature="-80°C")
# end of protocol
